nodes.text: A lightsaber was constructed by Jedi Knight Ben Skywalker. He used this weapon during his time as a Jedi.

Ben Skywalker built an aquamarine-blue bladed lightsaber around the time he was training under his cousin Jacen Solo. He used his lightsaber while he was working with Jacen in the Galactic Alliance Guard. He wielded it against Han Solo, Jaina Solo, and Zekk. Ben accidentally injured Zekk which forced Jaina to take it away from him.

He reclaimed his weapon after it was confiscated when he was captured by Tahiri Veila on Coruscant. He continued to use this lightsaber during his travels across the galaxy with his father. It was briefly used by Sith Vestara Khai against the Nightsisters of Dathomir.
